29: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אֵלָ֔יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>yourself</n> יָדַ֔עְתָּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>unto him Thou knowest</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>how</n> עֲבַדְתִּ֑יךָ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>I have served</n> וְאֵ֛ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>thee and how</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have fared</n> מִקְנְךָ֖ <sup>4735 </sup> <n>thy cattle</n> אִתִּֽי׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n>

33: וְעָֽנְתָה־ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>answer</n> בִּ֤י צִדְקָתִי֙ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>So shall my righteousness</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>for me in time</n> מָחָ֔ר <sup>4279 </sup> <n>to come</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> תָב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>when it shall come</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> שְׂכָרִ֖י <sup>7939 </sup> <n>for my hire</n> לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before thy face</n> כֹּ֣ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every one</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> אֵינֶנּוּ֩ <sup>369 </sup> <n>is not</n> נָקֹ֨ד <sup>5348 </sup> <n>that [is] not speckled</n> וְטָל֜וּא <sup>2921 </sup> <n>and spotted</n> בָּֽעִזִּ֗ים <sup>5795 </sup> <n>among the goats</n> וְחוּם֙ <sup>2345 </sup> <n>and brown</n> בַּכְּשָׂבִ֔ים <sup>3775 </sup> <n>among the sheep</n> גָּנ֥וּב <sup>1589 </sup> <n>that shall be counted stolen</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אִתִּֽי׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n>

41: וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>whenever</n> יַחֵם֮ <sup>3179 </sup> <n>did conceive</n> הַצֹּ֣אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>cattle</n> הַמְקֻשָּׁרוֹת֒ <sup>7194 </sup> <n>And it came to pass whensoever the stronger</n> וְשָׂ֨ם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>laid</n> יַעֲקֹ֧ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>that Jacob</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמַּקְל֛וֹת <sup>4731 </sup> <n>the rods</n> לְעֵינֵ֥י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>before the eyes</n> הַצֹּ֖אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>of the cattle</n> בָּרֳהָטִ֑ים <sup>7298 </sup> <n>in the gutters</n> לְיַחְמֵ֖נָּה <sup>3179 </sup> <n>that they might conceive</n> בַּמַּקְלֽוֹת׃ <sup>4731 </sup> <n>among the rods</n>
42: וּבְהַעֲטִ֥יף <sup>5848 </sup> <n>were feeble</n> הַצֹּ֖אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>But when the cattle</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָשִׂ֑ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>he put [them] not in</n> וְהָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הָעֲטֻפִים֙ <sup>5848 </sup> <n>so the feebler</n> לְלָבָ֔ן <sup>3837 </sup> <n>were Laban's</n> וְהַקְּשֻׁרִ֖ים <sup>7194 </sup> <n>and the stronger</n> לְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob's</n>
43: וַיִּפְרֹ֥ץ <sup>6555 </sup> <n>increased</n> הָאִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And the man</n> מְאֹ֣ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>exceedingly</n> מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>exceedingly</n> וַֽיְהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and had</n> לוֹ֙ צֹ֣אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>cattle</n> רַבּ֔וֹת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and had much</n> וּשְׁפָחוֹת֙ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>and maidservants</n> וַעֲבָדִ֔ים <sup>5650 </sup> <n>and menservants</n> וּגְמַלִּ֖ים <sup>1581 </sup> <n>and camels</n> וַחֲמֹרִֽים׃ <sup>2543 </sup> <n>and asses</n>
